content: introducing the spring cellar sweater crochet pattern a versatile and stylish design perfect for all skill levels this easy-level pattern features an oversized fit with plenty of positive ease making it comfortable and chic the pattern includes written instructions and a video tutorial for easy understanding crafted with bernat softee cotton yarn this dk/sport weight yarn provides the perfect drape and stitch definition for the sweater get ready to crochet a trendy v-neck sweater with the spring cellar sweater pattern **unique features ** easy-level crochet pattern written instructions and video tutorial included sizes available from s to 5x **presented as a blog crochet along in 4 parts ** part 1 https //www mooglyblog com/spring-cellar-sweater-part-1/ https //www mooglyblog com/spring-cellar-sweater-part-1/ part 2 https //www mooglyblog com/spring-cellar-sweater-part-2/ https //www mooglyblog com/spring-cellar-sweater-part-3/ part 3 https //www mooglyblog com/spring-cellar-sweater-part-3/ https //www mooglyblog com/spring-cellar-sweater-part-3/ part 4 https //www mooglyblog com/spring-cellar-sweater-part-4/ https //www mooglyblog com/spring-cellar-sweater-part-4/ **materials needed ** us-i 5 5mm hook **furls** https //shareasale com/r cfm b=1866551&u=704992&m=116536&urllink=furlscrochet%2ecom%2fproducts%2fblush%2dstreamline%2dmetal%2dcrochet%2dhooks&afftrack= 1150 1250 1550 1750 yds **bernat softee cotton** https //amzn to/42hwv4m 3/light - 5 5 7 7 balls **stitch markers** https //amzn to/4jyp8v0
